prompts: Create a fossil-based Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with sharp claws.
I want a water-type Pokemon that has a sleek, streamlined body and sharp features.
Generate an ancient-looking Pokemon with a tough exoskeleton and a menacing stance.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of a crab and a dinosaur, with a brown color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon with elegant, scythe-like arms and a unique fossil theme.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that thrives in rocky environments and has a fierce expression.
Give me a unique Pokemon that resembles a mix between a predator and an ancient fossil.
